pageContext.claim: “Border rancher: 'We've found prayer rugs out here. It’s unreal.' Washington Examiner People coming across the Southern Border from many countries, some of which would be a big surprise.”
pageContext.analysis: The article Trump refers to has a video interview with an unnamed woman who claims she saw prayer rugs but also says that she saw no Middle Easterners. The video does not show the alleged prayer rugs and there is no other evidence they exist. It appears unlikely that devout Muslim would leave behind a prayer rugs. Migrants often carry heavy rugs to cover barbed wire and then leave them behind once they have cleared it.
